statements: SELECT * FROM employee_shift_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT employee_id, shift_date FROM employee_shift_schedule WHERE shift_date = '2022-01-05'
SELECT assignment, shift_time FROM employee_shift_schedule WHERE assignment LIKE '%Manager%'
SELECT * FROM employee_shift_schedule WHERE shift_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT employee_id, assignment FROM employee_shift_schedule ORDER BY assignment ASC
SELECT * FROM employee_shift_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY shift_date DESC, shift_time ASC
SELECT employee_id, assignment FROM employee_shift_schedule WHERE shift_date > '2022-01-01' AND shift_time >= '08:00:00'
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM employee_shift_schedule GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY total_shifts DESC
SELECT DISTINCT assignment FROM employee_shift_schedule
SELECT * FROM employee_shift_schedule WHERE assignment LIKE '%manager%';
SELECT * FROM employee_shifts
SELECT employee_id, shift_date, shift_hours FROM employee_shifts ORDER BY shift_date DESC
SELECT task_description FROM work_assignments WHERE task_priority > 3
SELECT * FROM work_assignments WHERE assignment_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM employee_shifts GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY total_shifts DESC
SELECT employee_id, shift_date, shift_hours FROM employee_shifts WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY shift_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM employee_shifts WHERE shift_hours > 8 ORDER BY employee_id, shift_date
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM employee_shifts GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_shifts > 3 ORDER BY total_shifts DESC

SELECT work_assignments.assignment_id, work_assignments.task_description, employee_shifts.shift_hours FROM work_assignments JOIN employee_shifts ON work_assignments.employee_id = employee_shifts.employee_id WHERE employee_shifts.shift_hours < 6 ORDER BY work_assignments.assignment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT employee_id, MAX(shift_hours) AS max_shift_hours FROM employee_shifts GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY max_shift_hours DESC
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT shift_name, start_time, end_time FROM shifts ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM work_assignments WHERE assignment_date='2023-01-15';

SELECT employee_name, shift_name FROM employees JOIN work_assignments ON employees.employee_id = work_assignments.employee_id JOIN shifts ON work_assignments.shift_id = shifts.shift_id WHERE department='IT';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT employee_name, shift_schedule FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales'
SELECT employee_name, shift_schedule, shift_name FROM employees e INNER JOIN work_assignments wa ON e.employee_id = wa.employee_id INNER JOIN shifts s ON wa.shift_id = s.shift_id
SELECT * FROM work_assignments WHERE assignment_date = CURDATE()
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department_id FROM Employees WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM WorkAssignments WHERE date = '2022-12-31' AND completed = TRUE;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, shift_name FROM Employees JOIN Shifts ON Employees.shift_id = Shifts.shift_id;

SELECT first_name, last_name, department_name, start_time, end_time FROM Employees JOIN Shifts ON Employees.shift_id = Shifts.shift_id JOIN Departments ON Employees.department_id = Departments.department_id;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Employees WHERE shift_id = 2 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM Departments JOIN Employees ON Departments.department_id = Employees.department_id GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT * FROM WorkAssignments WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-05' AND completed = TRUE;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, s.shift_name FROM Employees e JOIN Shifts s ON e.shift_id = s.shift_id WHERE e.first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY e.last_name DESC, s.start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employment_date FROM employees WHERE employment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT shift_name FROM shifts ORDER BY shift_name DESC;
SELECT plant_name, schedule_date FROM plants JOIN plant_shift_schedule ON plants.plant_id = plant_shift_schedule.plant_id WHERE schedule_date = '2022-05-10';
SELECT employee_name, shift_name FROM employees JOIN work_assignments ON employees.employee_id = work_assignments.employee_id JOIN shifts ON work_assignments.shift_id = shifts.shift_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employment_date FROM employees ORDER BY employment_date DESC;

SELECT employee_name, shift_name FROM employees JOIN work_assignments ON employees.employee_id = work_assignments.employee_id JOIN shifts ON work_assignments.shift_id = shifts.shift_id WHERE work_assignments.assignment_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT employees.employee_name, shifts.shift_name FROM employees INNER JOIN work_assignments ON employees.employee_id = work_assignments.employee_id INNER JOIN shifts ON work_assignments.shift_id = shifts.shift_id WHERE employees.employee_name LIKE 'J%';

SELECT plant_name, shift_name FROM plants JOIN plant_shift_schedule ON plants.plant_id = plant_shift_schedule.plant_id JOIN shifts ON plant_shift_schedule.shift_id = shifts.shift_id WHERE plant_shift_schedule.schedule_date > '2022-06-30';
